name: Shovel Knight Duels
description:
(You may need to reload the page if controls aren't working!)

Controls:

Player 1 (Left): A / D: Move left and right | S: Dive

Player 2 (Left): Left Arrow / Right Arrow: Move left and right | Down Arrow: Dive

This is a fan game based on Shovel Knight by Yacht Club Games. Sprite and sound work is all original, but the designs of the characters belong to the original creators. I hope you enjoy this little bouncing game!

Any and all feedback is appreciated in the comments below.
